results.title: Refractory intraoperative hypotension with elevated serum tryptase
results.text_hl: However, allergology workup ruled out an allergic etiology as well as @<m>DISEASE_Mastocytosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008415 @@@mastocytosis@@@, and @DISEASE_Hypotension @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotension@@@ recalcitrant to treatment was attributed to uninterrupted @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ therapy.

citations.NLM: Sprung J, Larson KJ, Divekar RD, Butterfield JH, Schwartz LB, Weingarten TN. Refractory intraoperative hypotension with elevated serum tryptase Asia Pac Allergy. 2015 Jan;5(1):47-50. PMID: 25653920
